How does Gmail keep my email conversations secure and private?

Gmail has always had strong security as a foundation. We work hard to protect you from spam, phishing and malware before it reaches your inbox. Our AI-enhanced spam-filtering capabilities block approximately 10 million spam emails every minute.

How can I keep my emails more safe and secure?

While Gmail's features are secure enough for most users, some accounts may require an extra layer of security. Google's Advanced Protection program protects users with high visibility and sensitive information, who are at risk of targeted online attacks.

What if I want to use Gmail for work or my business?

Gmail is part of Google Workspace where you can choose from different plans. In addition to everything you love about Gmail, you get a custom email ID (@yourcompany.com), unlimited group email IDs, 99.9% guaranteed uptime, double storage on personal Gmail, no ads, 24/7 support, Microsoft Get Google Workspace sync for Outlook, and more.
